structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH

law.text: The Tuesday after the first Monday in November in Presidential election years shall be a state holiday on which all state offices, all schools and all state universities and colleges shall be closed. Any employee who is required to work on said state holiday shall receive compensatory pay or time off.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 18, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 71, effective December 1, 1972.
